attributes.action: R.Maddison, Treasurer. First church of Christ,Scientist Southport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our water bill has been £60 per year.This year it is £411. In three years time it will be over £1200 per year.This cannot be fair! Surely churches who give moneies to charities should have special treatment.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
